channel.title: Comments on: What is Product Information Management?

item.title: By: Garry Thomos
item.dc:creator: Garry Thomos
item.description: Wow, great post on PIM solutions. Got to know about Enterworks.com's MDM solutions recently and I bought it for my company. Check them out, Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Wow, great post on PIM solutions. Got to know about Enterworks.com’s MDM solutions recently and I bought it for my company. Check them out, Thanks!
